title: MAlware has taken a total control of Google play services. It has run-of-the-mill over my entire sys
content:
Everything I know which obviously isn't enough
.I can't install her she won't even let me uninstall her updates which I think is where the junk is
she has Google assistant in her paws for some reason in Google Assistant blocks be instead of helps me so I turn her off would you please come into my system I give you permission and look and see what's going on thank you I need to rid of it.
